label: 隠元隆琦
本: Obaku Zen: The Emergence of the Third Sect of Zen in Tokugawa Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2000
説明文: Obaku's founder in China.  Arrived in Japan in 1654 and founded the main temple of the sect, Obaku-san Mampuku-ji in Uji in 1661. Yin-yüan served as founder and first abbot, modeling his new temple on Huang-po Wan-fu-ssu in design and organization (pp. 24-25).  [黄檗、黄檗山万福寺、宇治]
